attributes.action: Ban the introduction of smart meters on health grounds
attributes.additional_details:
Smart meters are extremely bad for your health in respect of the RF output. Much worse than a mobile phone against the side of your head for 24 hrs per day. Some meters are used as a local hub to the neibourhood and are even more hazardous than the standard. In shared buildings with many meters in a group, with a family the otherside of the wall there are likely to be instant health concerns.
They are also an intrusion into our private lives to an unprecedented degree.
All properties must be fitted with these devises by 2020 by government decree - this must be debated again especially in relation to the health issues and stopped.
